about_the_game:
Spell Slinger: A Magical First-Person Open-World Adventure!


Embark on an enchanting journey through a sprawling fantasy world in Spell Slinger, a first-person open-world action game that blends magical exploration with thrilling extraction shooter gameplay. Start each mission at a random point on the map, uncover hidden treasures, solve intricate puzzles, and soar the skies on your magical broom. Whether battling solo or engaging in intense PvP confrontations, every corner of this richly detailed realm offers endless adventure.

Master the Art of Magic and Extraction!


Dive into a world where your magical skills and strategic thinking are tested at every turn. From casting powerful spells to riding enchanted brooms, your abilities evolve as you unlock new spells and level up. Collect over 250 unique items and navigate through an innovative hub for missions—including 30 meticulously crafted quests and procedurally generated challenges. Each mission concludes with an intense extraction point; escape to earn rewards, but get banished, and all quest progress is lost.

Shape the World Around You!


Your decisions in Spell Slinger don’t just affect your journey—they transform the world itself. Engage with the community to make choices that temporarily or permanently alter the game environment. Unlock secret rooms, discover new corridors, and watch as your magic reshapes landscapes in a world where every spell can make a difference.

Join the adventure and help shape the future of Arcanix in Spell Slinger, where magic meets high stakes and limitless possibilities!

  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
